REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2369 reute u f BC-L.-LURIA-<LUR>-TO-SUP 03-19 0076

TEXT.TITLE: L. LURIA <LUR> TO SUPPLY NETWORK PROGRAM
TEXT.BODY: L. Luria and Son INc said it reached an agreement in principle to be the exclusive supplier of merchandise to be sold through a new game and home shopping television show being considered by a major television network. The company declined to elaborate beyond this statement. It said the arrangement is subject to a formal agreement and board approval of the network and Luria. Reuter
